title: Charge 5 devices at the same time with this portable power station
content:
The ScoutPro: The Ultimate All-in-One Charger with LED Display is a portable power station with a 24,000mAh capacity battery and multiple charging connections to keep you powered throughout the day. During Black Friday, the ScoutPro is on sale for $127.20 (Reg. $349) with coupon code BFSAVE20.

This powerful battery can charge 5 devices at the same time, including powering your Macbook. The ScoutPro comes with a large wireless charging pad, a Type-C output, a magnetic charging station, and a USB-A port. That means you can power your computer, tablet, phone, watch, and AirPods at the same time. If you’re worried about how much power the ScoutPro has left, all you have to do is check the LED display to get a summary of how it’s doing. 

Get the ScoutPro: The Ultimate All-in-One Charger with LED Display for $127.20 (Reg. 349) with coupon code BFSAVE20 during the sitewide Black Friday Sale. 

Prices subject to change.
author: DealPost Team
